extracted-table.table-caption: Changes in cognitive function by study arm (NNRTI study)

caption.p: Changes in cognitive function by study arm (NNRTI study)

table-wrap-foot.p: SD, standard deviation; CI, confidence interval; p value, two-tailed. Lower scores at Identification, Detection, One Back, Groton Maze Chase, Groton Maze Learning, SET shifting, Global cognitive score indicate better performance. Higher scores at the One Card Learning task indicate better performance
